name: Checkers AI
description:
This is a project I've been working on for a long time.

It was inspired by Sebastian Leagues Chess AI and this is my checkers - ai.

It is built with python and so cannot calculate as deep as something like Sebastian leagues Chess ai but it can still calculate a lot of positions. It uses minimax, alpha-beta pruning, and iterative deepening.

It's drag and drop. The bot takes a max of 6 seconds to think so do pls wait but if the bot crosses 7 seconds restart the page as the bot broke.

Do try and tell me if u win which u probably will because the bot kinda sucks but I'm working on it and I will make it decent.

Please, try both red and blue as then I will be able to see where my bot is going wrong or if it's biased towards any side.
